title.native: Re:ゼロから始める異世界生活

description:
Subaru Natsuki was just trying to get to the convenience store but wound up summoned to another world. He encounters the usual things--life-threatening situations, silver haired beauties, cat fairies--you know, normal stuff. All that would be bad enough, but he's also gained the most inconvenient magical ability of all--time travel, but he's got to die to use it. How do you repay someone who saved your life when all you can do is die?

(Source: Yen Press)
synonyms: Re: Life in a different world from zero
Re:Zero - Życie w innym świecie od zera
Re:Zero - Жизнь с нуля в альтернативном мире
Re: Zero - Bắt đầu lại ở thế giới khác
Re:Zero รีเซทชีวิต ฝ่าวิกฤตต่างโลก
Re:Zero – Começando Uma Vida em Outro Mundo
Re:Zero - Re:vivre dans un autre monde à partir de zéro

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Time Loop
tags.description: A character is stuck in a repetitive cycle that they are attempting to break out of. This is distinct from a manipulating time of their own choice.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Witch
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a witch.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Cosmic Horror
tags.description: A type of horror that emphasizes human insignificance in the grand scope of cosmic reality; fearing the unknown and being powerless to fight it.

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Astronomy
tags.description: Relating or centered around the study of celestial objects and phenomena, space, or the universe.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Memory Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) who has had their memories altered.

tags.name: Cult
tags.description: Features a social group with unorthodox religious, spiritual, or philosophical beliefs and practices.

tags.name: Body Horror
tags.description: Features characters who undergo horrific transformations or disfigurement, often to their own detriment.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Elf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is an elf.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Alternate Universe
tags.description: Features multiple alternate universes in the same series.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Dissociative Identities
tags.description: A case where one or more people share the same body.

tags.name: Unrequited Love
tags.description: One or more characters are experiencing an unrequited love that may or may not be reciprocated.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: Assassins
tags.description: Centers around characters who murder people as a profession.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Femboy
tags.description: Features a boy who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of girls.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Yandere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is obsessively in love with another, to the point of acting deranged or violent.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Crossdressing
tags.description: Prominently features a character dressing up as the opposite sex.

tags.name: Medieval
tags.description: Partially or completely set in the Middle Ages or a Middle Ages-inspired setting. Commonly features elements such as European castles and knights.

tags.name: Zombie
tags.description: Prominently features reanimated corpses which often prey on live humans and turn them into zombies.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Curses
tags.description: Features a character, object or area that has been cursed, usually by a malevolent supernatural force.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Necromancy
tags.description: When the dead are summoned as spirits, skeletons, or the undead, usually for the purpose of gaining information or to be used as a weapon.

tags.name: Werewolf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a werewolf.
